problem_text_cn: 如图,在边长为4的正方形内部,以各边为直径画四个半圆,则图中阴影部分的面积是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, inside the square with edge length N_0, draw four semicircles with each edge as the diameter, then the area of ​​the shaded part in the figure is ()
raw_answer: 解:如图所示,S_{阴影}=S~△AOB~=\frac{1}{4}S~正方形~=\frac{1}{4}×4×4=4．故选:A．
